overview:
Silicon Valley Startup Attorney

Corporate Lawyer & CFO Consultant

Chris Barsness, Esq. M.B.A.

I am a Silicon Valley business and corporate attorney that represents individuals and businesses in a wide variety of legal matters.

Ever since I was young and writing code in BASIC, using MS-DOS, an Apple II, and 5.25inch floppy disks, I was dreaming of the future of tech (the day I could get one of those new dial-up modems that were about to come out).

I can handle everything from the board room to the court room with a client-friendly, hands-on approach that utilizes our years of legal and practical business experience to obtain the best possible results.

“I started this law firm to help businesses in not just their legal issues, but to plan and make decisions to avoid potential litigation or other negative business problems,” Chris Barsness, Esq. M.B.A.

Email Me:

Info@siliconvalleystartupattorney.com

degrees.subject: Law
degrees.institution: University of San Diego School of Law
